title: Django and Sartana Are Coming... It's the End

sources.title: Django and Sartana Are Coming... It's the End (1970) 3 million reasons to run.- Western film
sources.description:
Burt Keller's outlaw gang snatches Jessica Brewster and to flee to Mexico, but cash-chasing bounty hunter Django and law-bringing gunslinger Sartana crash their plans. Bullets fly, fists swing, and the unhinged outlaw faces twin trouble in a desert showdown.

Original title: Arrivano Django e Sartana... Ã¨ la fine (1970)
Alternative title: Django and Sartana... Showdown in the West

Director: Demofilo Fidani, Diego Spataro
Writers: Demofilo Fidani, Mila Vitelli Valenza

Main cast:
Hunt Powers - Django
Chet Davis - Sartana
Gordon Mitchell - Burt Keller
Simone Blondell - Jessica Brewster

Genres: Western, Spaghetti Western
Release date: 14 November 1970 
Filming location: Italy

metadata.Plot: A gang of vicious outlaws lead by the crazed Black Burt Keller abduct Jessica Colby and decide to flee to Mexico. Shrewd bounty hunter Django and saintly roving gunslinger Sartana join forces to rescue the poor lass from the gang's vile clutches.
metadata.Actors: Jack Betts, Franco Borelli, Gordon Mitchell
